divs: Sighting DetailsI was heading back from a football game in Abline that day, I was traveling South on Hwy 84 near the small town of Novice when I noticed in the Eastern sky a white object in the sky, at first thought it was a plane but it did not move like a plane, it would move but not much, pretty much stayed in the same area. A cold front had came through the area around 4:00 pm that day and it was cloudy and pretty high winds from the north. Stopped in Coleman for about 15 minutes did not think any more about it, was headed SE out of Coleman on Hwy 84 towards Santa Anna and looked to the NE and I seen the same object. I did not stop and look at it, was for some reason in hurry to catch the second half of the Cowboys. Just curious if anyone else seen the object.
Summary: Bright white star like object in sky.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Novice
This sighting has never been favorited.
